manpage.author: Brian Langenberger
manpage.name: prints information about a DVD-Audio disc
manpage.title: DVD-Audio Disc Information
manpage.description: dvdainfo takes a mounted DVD-Audio disc and writes information about the it to standard output. This information includes the length, start sector, end sector, codec, sample rate, channel count and bits-per-sample of each track in each title.
